decks.notes: This deck aims to quickly fill the graveyard with spells and then utilize cards like Arclight Phoenix and Picklock Prankster to bring them back onto the battlefield for aggressive plays. It also includes powerful removal like Lightning Axe and Fiery Impulse to control the board and protect your creatures. The inclusion of Treasure Cruise and Temporal Trespass provides card advantage and the ability to finish the game with a powerful extra turn spell. The deck is focused on fast-paced gameplay, utilizing spell synergies to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Greasefang Parhelion combo as a win condition. The deck includes cards that support the combo such as Fleeting Spirit, Monument to Endurance, Parhelion II, and Greasefang, Okiba Boss. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Fatal Push and disruptive cards like Thoughtseize to control the game until the combo can be assembled. The mana base includes a mix of different lands to ensure consistency in casting the required spells. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble the combo and overwhelm the opponent with powerful synergies.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly play aggressive creatures while disrupting opponents with hand disruption and removal spells. By applying early pressure with cards like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Cecil, Dark Knight, the deck aims to control the board and keep opponents on the defensive. Additionally, using cards like Thoughtseize and Spell Pierce helps to disrupt opponents' game plans and protect your own creatures. Overall, the key strategy is to maintain tempo and pressure while disrupting opponents to secure a win.

The deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's strategy through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. It also utilizes a companion creature for additional synergy. The deck contains a mix of land destruction, card draw, and powerful planeswalkers to outvalue the opponent and stall the game until it can establish a dominant position. It aims to outlast threats and overwhelm opponents with superior card advantage and tempo.

The deck focuses on assembling the Greasefang Parhelion combo, using cards like Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II to generate infinite flying creatures. The deck also includes enablers like Fleeting Spirit and Seasoned Hallowblade to protect the combo pieces. Thoughtseize and Fatal Push are used for disruption and removal, while cards like Guardian of New Benalia and Monument to Endurance provide utility and support for the combo strategy. The mana base is designed to support the color requirements of the deck while providing sufficient mana sources for the combo pieces.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana and playing Lotus Field to generate a large amount of mana in order to cast powerful spells like Scapeshift and Thassa's Oracle quickly. It also utilizes cards like Lumra, Bellow of the Woods and Stock Up to draw cards and maintain card advantage. The deck aims to create a powerful engine that can win the game in a sudden and explosive fashion through combo plays and resource manipulation. It focuses on skillful play and strategic decision-making to outmaneuver opponents and dominate the battlefield.

The main concept of this red aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of direct damage spells and aggressive creatures. By using efficient creatures like Heartfire Hero and Emberheart Challenger alongside burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, the deck aims to deal damage early and often, while controlling the board with cards like Reckless Rage. The inclusion of cards like Monstrous Rage and Screaming Nemesis also adds a level of versatility, allowing for additional damage output or creature removal as needed. Overall, the deck is focused on maintaining pressure and ending the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy, utilizing a combination of powerful creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and apply pressure early on. By curving out efficiently with low-cost creatures like Llanowar Elves and Skyclave Apparition, the deck aims to maintain a strong board presence and push for damage quickly. Cards like Collected Company and Archon of Emeria provide additional value and disruption, ensuring that the opponent struggles to stabilize and mount a defense. Overall, the key theme of this deck is to swiftly establish dominance and close out the game before the opponent can recover.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of powerful creatures and disruptive spells. The deck utilizes Blackcleave Cliffs and Blood Crypt for mana fixing, while Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse put pressure on the opponent. Fatal Push and Duress help control the board, while Mutavault and Blightstep Pathway provide additional threats. Fable of the Mirror-Breaker acts as a primary win condition, while cards like Thoughtseize and Kolaghan's Command disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a mix of aggression and disruption.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, and card draw. It leverages the power of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to maximize its value. The deck prioritizes maintaining board control, disrupting the opponent's strategy, and generating card advantage to outlast the opponent. By utilizing cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and March of Otherworldly Light, the deck aims to dominate the battlefield and grind out a victory through attrition. Multiple win conditions, such as Elspeth, Storm Slayer and Settle the Wreckage, provide versatility in closing out games.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and removal spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Mutavault is used as a versatile creature land, while Fatal Push and Abrade provide targeted removal. Bloodtithe Harvester and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger are strong threats that can quickly close out the game. Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provides additional aggression and disruption. The deck also includes hand disruption with Duress and Thoughtseize, along with powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive plays.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly equipping creatures with powerful artifacts to deal massive damage to the opponent. The key strategy is to carefully manage resources and use efficient equipment like Colossus Hammer and Shadowspear to turn small creatures into huge threats. Sigarda's Aid provides the deck with an advantage by allowing free equips, while Portable Hole and Kazuul's Toll Collector help control the opponent's board. By combining aggressive creatures with powerful equipment, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo between Greasefang and Parhelion II to create a powerful engine. By controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize, while protecting key pieces with Sheltered by Ghosts and Seasoned Hallowblade, the deck aims to assemble the combo and outvalue the opponent. The land base is optimized to ensure consistent mana sources for the combo pieces, while also providing utility lands to further enhance the strategy. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and aggressive, while also being able to play a controlling game when needed.

The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures and disruptive spells to apply pressure on the opponent early in the game. By utilizing cards like Collected Company and creatures with strong abilities like Archon of Emeria and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while simultaneously building a board presence. The deck also includes creatures that provide additional utility, such as Skyclave Apparition and Elite Spellbinder, to further disrupt the opponent and maintain tempo. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory quickly.

The deck revolves around utilizing the combination of Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II to create a powerful synergy that can overwhelm opponents. By controlling the board with cards like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to protect its key combo pieces while also disrupting the opponent's strategy. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Seasoned Hallowblade and Sheltered by Ghosts provides additional protection for the combo pieces. The deck also includes various lands to support the strategy and ensure smooth mana production for the combo to be executed effectively.

The deck focuses on using Enigmatic Incarnation as the main engine to control the board and search for powerful creatures to summon. It includes a variety of lands to ensure mana fixing and consistency, along with Leyline Binding to disrupt opponents' strategies. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional value and flexibility. Overall, the key concept revolves around utilizing Enigmatic Incarnation to efficiently tutor and play high-impact creatures while maintaining control over the game state.
